name: SHRD_CardLayout
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  style: "#FFF",
  showBorder: true,
  showShadow: true,
  shape: "ROUNDED",
  padding: "LESS",
  marginBelow: "STANDARD",
  height: a!defaultValue(ri!height, "AUTO"),
  contents: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!title),
    a!defaultValue(ri!contents, {}),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
      label: ri!title,
      labelSize: "MEDIUM",
      labelHeadingTag: "H2",
      labelColor: "SECONDARY",
      marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
      marginBelow: "NONE",
      contents: a!defaultValue(ri!contents, {})
    )
  )
)
